resources.string: This app vibrates the current time when the display is locked and the power button is pressed twice in a row with a delay between 500 and 1500 milliseconds. It is started automatically after booting is finished.

The time is processed digit by digit.
Vibration Pattern: short = 1, long = 5

Examples:
- 02:11 = short . short ... short .. short
- 10:53 = short .. long . long ... long .. short . short . short
